choices: Enter the hall and head to the table
Enter the hall and go to the stage to talk to Andromeda
1.content: Andromeda sets down her case, opens it, and withdraws a lyre. The hall is still deserted, so she decides not to play yet. Her eyes are drawn to the huge buffet table, laden with piles of fruit, several large turkeys and hams, and in the center an entire prize pig, roasted to bubbly perfection. Not sure she can handle that monstrosity, and a little intimidated at being the first to break into its skin, she gravitates toward the finger food. She plops a couple of grapes directly into her mouth, and then loads up a small plate with cubed cheese, apple slices with caramel sauce, and her absolute favorite: a deviled egg. She heads to the punch bowl and pours herself a glass. Carrying both the plate and glass back to the little stage in the corner, she settles herself in for the party. The host has graciously provided a small table next to her stool, upon which is already set a pitcher of ice water and a glass. Meda lays her plate and punch on the table, and picks up the lyre. With the lyre in her lap, she reaches to the plate and plucks the deviled egg from it, and takes a slow bite, savoring the creamy texture. She finishes off the egg, and realizing she has forgotten to pick up a napkin, wipes her fingers on her pants. She looks up to see the first of the guests arriving. She flexes her fingers and begins to play.
1.title: Musical entertainment for the party

choices: Poet greets the guests
Poet makes a speech to the guests after a few more arrive
Kids start playing with the provided games
Clusters of guests start to form
11.content:
Being late to starting her own party, Poet rushes in and see that there is already a guest. Going over to Andromeda, Poet introduces herself and starts a conversation. Both women go to the food tables and Poet plces the food she brought on them. Bringing lasagna, German chocolate cake, a fresh veggie platter with dip, and a large pitcher of iced lemonade, Poet hoped that there would be others who would join in the festivities.

          Soon other guests begin to arrive.
11.title: Enter the hall and head to the table

choices: The adults join the dance.
More guests enter.
Birds and butterflies appear, and join the dance.
113.content:
Soon, families start to arrive, and Poet and Andromeda smile to see children of all ages, dressed in their festive best, enter the hall, chattering in various languages.

Language is no barrier for children, they understand things adults have long since forgotten. Various groups easily make friends with each other, talking, smiling, laughing, gesturing. Seeing the ease with which their children break the ice, the adults, too, start to talk. Soon, the hall is filled with happy sounds, talking, laughing, music - and singing.

The children are singing. Somehow, all of them know the same lyrics and the same tune. None of the adults have heard the song before. They don't know where their children learnt it. But the children sing, completely absorbed in the song, and in dancing to the tune they create. As they sing, they throw coloured hoops to each other. Poet had placed the hoops in one corner of the room, hoping they'd be useful in a game. Instead, they are used to compose the most spectacular dance anyone in the room has ever witnessed - the dance of the children.

As the children sing and dance in harmony, their colourful clothes flashing and their hands moving in rhythm to keep the hoops swirling in the air, everyone in the room feels a sense of peace, a sense of pure joy.
113.title: Kids start playing with the provided games

choices: More guests arrive
Andromeda starts to play
The animals decide to have a little fun
114.content:
Amanda joins the festivities with her family, her Mom and Dad and even her pesky little sister Stephanie, Amanda also has someone with her, her beloved black and white kitten Gimli ( So named because he has a black chin that her sister calls a Dwarf beard)

Amanda and her family aren't the only people who brought along pets, there are cats, dogs, rabbits, a pony, a massive draft horse and even a few pot bellied pigs!

Amanda drops off Gimli with the other cats, pats him on the head, telling him 'We'll be back soon." Gimli mews in response.

Amanda and her family are simple folk, ordinary citizens from Burbank California. She sees the food table and immediately begins to help herself to some fruit, vegetables and other things.

Now that there are quite a few quests Andromeda wonders if she should start the music
114.title: Clusters of guests start to form

choices: It was a girl
It was a boy
It was a strange Non-Human creature!
1141.content:
Ichabod was a little unsure of coming here, the shy, nerdy, redheaded teenager was a bit timid about big social gatherings but his Mother assured him everything would be all right.

The first thing Ichabod noticed was the food table and how good it smelled, with the multiple hams, turkeys and even the suckling pig! He looked at what he had brought to the feast and felt disappointed with himself

"Here I am." He said "At this magnificent feast, and here I am bringing Coleslaw like it's a backyard barbecue.

"Ichabod," Don't belittle yourself!" His Father whispers as he put a big pot of beef stew on the table "Coleslaw is not the worst thing you can bring! I mean your Mother brought nothing but ice water!"

"Just in case we run out of water!" Ichabod's Mother said in her defense "Guests can get very thirsty!"

Ichabod's Father chuckled, Ichabod not sure weather to feel better or not put his coleslaw on the table and quickly back away from the table.

As Poet gave her guests a welcoming speech, Ichabod backed off to the side of the room, he did not look where he was going and backed into someone else
1141.title: More guests arrive

choices: Ichabod accepts
Ichabod declines
11411.content:
Ichabod bumped into a young woman who was a bit older then him, she looked about 22 while he was only 15.

"Oh hey." Amanda said "You look like you go to my school!"

"Um..." Ichabod said "Do I know you?"

"I'm in the Transition Program." Amanda said "For young adults."

"Oh I wouldn't know anything about that." Ichabod said "I'm only 15."

"What did you bring to the potluck?" Amanda asked

"What?" Ichabod said

"I said, What did you bring to the potluck?"

"Oh..." Ichabod blushed "I only brought coleslaw."

"I brought an apple pie." Amanda said "My little sister brought this sugar pie I'm eating, care for some?"
11411.title: Amanda greets Ichabod

choices: Ichabod Accepts
Ichabod declines
11412.content:
The Boy had brown hair and kind brown eyes, He was carrying a large apple pie.

"Oh!" Ichabod said "Terribly sorry! I didn't see you there!"

"Oh it's OK." The Brown Haired Boy said who seemed just as bashful as Ichabod "It's a lucky thing I didn't drop my pie."

"Here let me help you with that! That pie looks heavy." Together the two boys put the pie on the feast table

"Who are you?' Ichabod asked

"My name is Jim Buckwheat." The Brown Haired Boy said bashfully "My Mom is a Baker from Albany New York, she kind of taught me everything I know about baking.

An awkward silence followed

"Hey people are starting to dance!" Jim said "Want to meet some nice girls?"
11412.title: It was a boy

choices: Ichabod does not know what to say
Ichabod is gracious to the young cat
11413.content:
"Oh!" Ichabod said quickly apologetic for his clumsiness "Terribly sorry! I should have watched where I was going!"

"That's OK." The young person said "I should have watched where I was going as well! It's lucky a didn't drop my dish!"

"What did you bring?" The Boy asked

"Fish soup." Said the young strange looking girl

"You know it's funny." Ichabod said with a chuckle "But because you're standing in the shadows just so, you almost look like a cat!"

"Um..." The Girl said "That's because I am a cat."

Ichabod stopped laughing at once, the young girl stepped into the light, she had pink and purple fur and long hair the color of her fur, she had brown eyes and long whiskers
11413.title: Marzipan the Cat Girl!

choices: Join the Dancers
Watch
114131.content:
Ichabod was silent, he did not know what to say, the Cat Girl waved a paw in front of him

"Hello?" She said "Anybody in there?"

Ichabod shook himself out of his trance

"I'm sorry." He said bashfully "I've never seen an Animal Person before!"

"That's OK." The Cat Girl said "Not everyone is accustomed to seeing an Anthropomorphic cat or rabbit or baboon..." She said with some sadness

"Oh..." Ichabod said

There was a long silence

"I'm Ichabod Crane." Ichabod said at last.

"I'm Marzipan Cheshire." The Cat Girl said

"Look." Marzipan said "They're staring to dance! Do you want to join them or just watch?"
114131.title: Amazing

choices: They Continue to Watch
They go get more food
1141312.content:
"I'd rather just watch the dancing...If you don't mind." Ichabod added

Marzipan shrugged "Fine with me." She said "Do you want to get a bite to eat?"

"Now that you mention it I am a little hungry." Ichabod said

They helped themselves to a good portion of the Feast's food. Marzipan helped herself to a bowl of the beef stew, and poured herself a glass of milk. Ichabod's father brought. Ichabod got a slice of turkey breast and added some mashed potatoes and cranberry sauce to go with it.

They sat on a bench and watched the Dancers spin themselves around and around

"Those guys are real athletes huh?" Marzipan asked

"Mmmm Hmmm" Ichabod agreed he couldn't open his mouth at the time because he was savoring a delicious bite of turkey
1141312.title: Watch

choices: Ichabod and Marzipan start dancing wildly
The Dancers stop to feast
114132.content:
"Oh! Oh! Excuse me Madame Cat!" Ichabod said bowing low "I heard that some of the guests would be of Non-Human variety but I never expected..."

"Oh don't be so bashful." Marzipan said as she put her dish on the table "We animal people are not as stuffy as the stories you humans tell say we are."

Suddenly the music starts playing, a soft a subtle waltz.

"Would you like to dance?" Marzipan asked

"What?" Ichabod was a little confused

"What do you mean what?" Marzipan laughed "I'm asking if you want to dance!"

Ichabod blushed but then he saw Marzipan's bright honest face and decided to take a risk

"Sure..." He said "Why not?"

Soon many more young people start dancing, many of them are Animal People, some of them dance with human youths some with other Beast Folk
114132.title: Animal People

choices: Marzipan and Ichabod
Lea and Taren
1141321.content:
As the music begins to speed up so do the dancers.

Marzipan begins to dance much more wildly then before, Ichabod is forced to dance along with her.

As the two of them begin their crazy dance, two other Animal People, a Dragon Boy and Dragon Girl take notice

"Hey!" The Dragon Girl says "We can dance better then that!" She turned to her partner "Come on Taren! Let's show them who the REAL masters of the dance floor are!"

Ichabod begins to get very nervous as the Dragons start dancing then he realizes 'This is a dance contest! Marzipan picked me because she wanted someone to dance with!'

As the couple continue dancing the music becomes faster and wilder, win the music stops the winners are...
1141321.title: The Wild Dance

choices: Ichabod and Marzipan have a long conversation
We show Ichabod's Mom and Dad
1141322.content:
Afterwards the dancers stop there dancing in order to take part in the buffet.

Ichabod and Marzipan are laughing as they both genuinely enjoyed themselves and start helping themselves to the feast

"That was fun!" Marzipan said as she ladled a bit of fish soup in her bowl, "We should do that again real soon!"

"Yeah..." Ichabod chuckled as he ladled some of his Father's beef stew into his bowl "We should...By the way where do you Animal People live?"

"Oh..." Marzipan said she hadn't been expecting this question "We live far away, in some remote country..."

"You don't sound that remote to me." Ichabod said "You sound like you come from Southern California..."

Marzipan looked at Ichabod unsure of how to answer, then she quickly found a way to change the conversation

"Let's move away fro,m the dessert table." She said quickly "I see some hungry people behind us ho probably want some pie..."

Ichabod and Marzipan move away from the dessert table they settle down to eat their meal
1141322.title: The Feast

choices: They continue talking
Switch the Ichabod's parents
11413221.content:
"So..." Ichabod began to say "Where do you animal people come from?"

Marzipan didn't answer right away instead she dipped a piece of Italian bread in her soup and took a bite out of the bread savoring the creamy goodness.

"That's difficult to explain." She said "Animal People actually don't originate on Earth at all, instead we come from another world entirely..."

"You're from another planet?" Ichabod asked

"Shhh!" Marzipan put a furry finger to her lips "People could be listening."

"Oh right, right." Ichabod said he took a spoonful of his beef stew and savored the hearty beef and velvety sauce
11413221.title: The Nature of the Animal People

choices: Switch back to Ichabod and Marzipan
Jonathan and Pamela strike up a conversation with another adult
11413222.content:
"Jonathan." Pamela said "Have you seen Ichabod?" I haven't seen him for 20 minutes!"

"Oh he's probably fine..." Jonathan says as he helps himself to a slice of turkey, "He's probably found a nice girl to talk to."

"Are you sure about that?" Pamela asked "Because he's always seemed so awkward around girls and..."

"Oh stop worrying so much!" Jonathan said as he piled on mashed potatoes and cranberry sauce onto his dish "Why don't we just sit back and enjoy the meal."

"I suppose..." Pamela said she helped herself to some steamed chard and poured herself a glass of water.

As they sat down to eat Pamela noticed that several of the guests were really enjoys the coleslaw Ichabod brought "They are really getting at that coleslaw." She muttered aloud

"Well why shouldn't they?" Jonathan asked "It's good coleslaw! Ichabod made it himself!"

"I suppose." Pamela said "But it's not exactly Haute Cuisine is it?"

"I suppose it isn't" Jonathan said "But does it matter?"
11413222.title: Jonathan and Pamela discuss Haute Cuisine

choices: The Animals help themselves to the feast
The animals begin to make their own music
The People put them back in their pens
1143.content:
The Animals not content just to watch from the sidelines while the humans have all the fun hatch a cunning plan to get out of their playpen and join the festivities.

A Young Calico Cat named Cocoa seems to be the ringleader, she opens the door to the cat pen with her little paw, once she's free she does the same with the dog pen

Soon all the animals are free
1143.title: The animals decide to have a little fun

choices: Everyone has a good laugh as the animals are put back int their pen
They decide to let the animals join the feast proper
11431.content:
"Come on everyone!" Cocoa mews in Animal language "Let's help ourselves to the feast!"

With that Cocoa jumps onto the table grabs herself a whole fish and leaps off the table

Gimli just a young kitten and still unsure of himself leaps onto the table and tries to get a bit of bacon when Amanda grabs him

"Gimli!" Amanda scolds "What do you think you're doing?"

Gimli protested but since he doesn't speak human language can only meow.

The large draft horse Sampson decide to help himself to the fruit bowl he starts with and apple getting drool all over the place

"Sampson!" His owner a young lady named Hunter scolds "Leave it!"

Gimli frees himself of his owner's grasp and gets back of the table, he jumps and lands in a big bowl of whipped cream!

"Someone get that cat out of there!" Someone yells

Amanda picks up her kitten who is busy licking the cream off himself "Oh Gimli..." She says
11431.title: Pets are hungry!

choices: The Animals want to dance
The Animals begin to sing
114312.content:
Everyone is ready to put the animals back in their playpen when someone said "Why not let them join the feast? They were probably lonely all by themselves with no one to play with...Let's have the join the feast!"

Everyone takes some time to think about and decide there is no harm in letting Animals join the feast. So they make room for the creatures by setting aside a big table piled high with everything the animals like to eat

(They let them have the bowl of whipped cream Gimli fell into and get another bowl for themselves)

The music begins to play as everyone begins to feast
114312.title: All of Nature's Creatures

choices: Andromeda plays as the feasting guests morph into
Andromeda stops playing and tries to warn the guests
12.content:
“What a resplendent welcome to this gathering!”

Andromeda’s fingers stopped of their own accord as the familiar voice resounded in the massive chamber. Embracing her music, she had presumed the guest would greet the table and partake of the bounty there laid, not her.

“Greetings, Lord Pan, I thank you for your generous praise of my humble attempt at coaxing music from this box of strings.” Andromeda replied, her discomfiture over the great Pan’s approach superseded by her ire at not noting his arrival. Her hosts must be important to command a visit from this great an artist.

“It is not the hosts who would command me,” the King of the Faeries answered her unspoken thought. “It was the sound of sibilant stars dancing upon this stage. Your fingers upon the lyre coaxed me here, to hear from close quarters the sweet melody. But first, I must bring my gift to the table.”

Andromeda watched him walk, no, nearly float, as if on air, to the table heaped with food. He reached in the pocket of his voluminous overcoat and removed a silver flask, upending its contents into the punchbowl. He then retrieved a box from his other pocket and untied the ribbon holding it closed to reveal at least a dozen cakes, which he laid at the table, right next to the deviled eggs. Then, he turned and, with fathomless eyes fixed on hers, returned to stand before her.

“Do you mind if I join you?”

“Of, of course, not, I would be honored,” Andromeda managed to sound out somehow from her tight throat.

“Then, let’s welcome the mortals in proper faerie tradition.” Pan removed his cape and stood at her left, nodding with a smile that belied the mischief resonating from his eyes, perhaps at the effects of the contents of the flask and the cakes. He produced a flute from the belt holding up his breeches.

Andromeda begged her shaking fingers to be nimble, or at least not stumble, as she started again the gentle refrain. Pan smiled and took up the chorus with his flute. The young dryad the king of the faeries thus greeted the mortals now pushing their way through the door. They were eager for the bounty of the table, enticed by the music to partake of the feast and wash it down with generous servings of the spiked punch. It promised to be a gathering to remember for generations to come; not merely international, but inter-stellar!
12.title: Enter the hall and go to the stage to talk to A...

choices: Pan has a gentle smile
Pan has a sinister smile
Pan begins to play his flute again
121.content:
...Anthropomorphic Animals!

Andromeda's jaw drops she is cannot believe what she is seeing!

A young prince, probably from the Middle East grows a long mane, his elegant dress becomes tawny fur, he turns into a Lion, the lady he was dancing with becomes a Lioness.

A young lady in an elegant ballgown turns into an elegant Tigress, a young nobleman grows a magnificent tail a Peacock.

Andromeda looks at her own hands and sees them morphing into claws she looks at her body and sees much to her surprise she has become an Anthropomorphic Chinese Dragon!

Despite all this, she doesn't feel upset or frightened, instead her transition to dragon feels natural

"All of you are turning into creatures you once were in a past life." Pan says "Experience the joy of channeling your past lives."

A young lady who has turned into a Horse begins to dance, she dances a wild free dance unlike any a human being can master.

Andromeda plays a tune for the Horse Woman to dance to...she looks at Pan
121.title: Andromeda plays as the feasting guests morph into

choices: Everyone starts zooming over the stars
They go to Pan's homeworld
They get turned back into humans
1213.content:
Pan begins to play his flute again.

The room starts to melt away, it seems like the animal/human guests are floating in outer space.

Andromeda is amazed! She has never seen such spectacular beauty before.

"Wait a minute!" Says the Peacock Nobleman "What happened? Where are we?!"

"We're in Outer Space!" Says the dancing Horse Woman

"I can see my house from here!" Says a young boy whose been turned into Squirrel

"I bring you the joy of the universe!" Pan says "Experience the beauty of the cosmos!"
1213.title: Pan begins to play his flute again

info.brief_description: Holiday dinner for everyone around the world.  Interesting food, drink, and conversation.
info.description:
Welcome to the 2007 International Holiday Dinner. Everyone is welcome. Please bring your favorite foods, drinks, and traditions. Maybe, if people start talking, then we can have a holiday season full of peace, joy, cherished memories, and love.

          The hall is large enough to accomodate a humungeous group. Please bring your families, pictures, ideas for games and musical instruments. This dinner will begin a new tradition and an annual event.
